channel.title: Pi and exion client[and some ip help]

item.title: Pi and exion client[and some ip help]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

so im pretty sure i have pi source with exion xlient. but how would i get the health orb and prayer orb to show up and work properly on my client??? people dont like having to look into the skills tab to see when they need to use a restore. and the orbs are nice

ok so i can get on my serv with desktop and laptop but my firends can get on i changed everything i thought i should change but help me out here. al lthis is ion client

if((j == 13 || j == 10) && inputString.length() > 0) { if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals("??????") || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) {
public client() { fullscreenInterfaceID = -1; chatRights = new int[500]; chatTypeView = 0; clanChatMode = 0; cButtonHPos = -1; cButtonHCPos = -1; cButtonCPos = 0; server = "0.0.0.0";
public static String server = my no-ip.biz here";
kk so what should go in those spots??? cause people cant get on my serv it says its offline for them. and yes i have portforwarded and people have played on my old server its just i switched to this new pi and idk what to do lol

Read full topic
